Articles.Content: So I was just browsing through here and wanted to check the last post of the Forum Test Thread (to find out why it had been locked), when I just got this 'error 502 bad gateway' page. It's been happening on other pages as well (such as What did you do in KSP today, and Ask the mods questions). Anyone know why this is happening?
There have been some weirdnesses on several of Squad's webpages recently. I believe they're mostly minor bugs from recent updates. IT is looking at that thread.
